summary: Reduced padding-bottom for ai-bot-section from 96px/64px/48px to 32px at all breakpoints. Added !important override rules in @layer utilities to ensure changes take effect. User reported no changes visible, may need hard refresh or CSS rebuild.
current_status: AI Bot section padding-bottom reduced to 32px with !important rules. Changes may require hard refresh (Ctrl+Shift+R) or CSS rebuild to be visible.
